title: Database Night
description: Talks on databases! - From SQL to noSQL   Derick Rethans, PHP Engineer/Evangelist on MongoDB, internals expert & author of Xdebug - One does not simply query a database   Kat Zien, Software Developer at Brightpearl - An introduction to graph databases   Kiel Doyle, newly Bristol-based freelancer BaseKit have kindly sponsored the event again, providing their office as the venue, as well as beer and pizza! Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.
